VR Technology in MS rehabilitation
  • About
  • Services
  • Games
  • Contact

VR experience to stimulate physical activity

VR games offer an engaging and motivating approach to stimulate physical activity in MS patients during rehabilitation, ultimately helping to improve their quality of life.
